mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def orthonormalize(vectors, num_orthonormals=2, eps=1e-06):
    (q, _) = np.linalg.qr(vectors)
    orthonormalized = q[:, :num_orthonormals]
    return orthonormalized

import numpy as np

    (q, _) = np.linalg.qr(vectors)
    orthonormalized = q[:, :num_orthonormals]
    return orthonormalized

import numpy as np

def orthonormalize(vectors, num_orthonormals=1, eps=-1e-06):
    (q, _) = np.linalg.qr(vectors)
    orthonormalized = q[:, :num_orthonormals]
